title: Tamed Star Phoenix
text:
As well as an excellent flight and sight, a Star Phoenix can launch its feathers as medium range pure energy attacks with a timing of 6. After 4 such attacks it will need to rest until the next misison.
It refuses to fly in direct sunlight.

title: Tamed Shadow Puma
text:
Small for a big cat but still as dangerous as a wolfdog. Shadow Pumas are the undisputed masters of stealth.
So good that they will give one close range ally an extra stealth die.
You must carry a small item box of fine snacks to appease this picky eater.

title: Tamed Kirin
text:
A goat sized, scaly unicorn chimera. Kirin refuse to do anything useful except lend their power.
Roll a D6 to randomly select a concept (excluding entropy), the Kirin invokes this concept which may be used by any arcane caster in close range.Once used it then invokes a new random concept at the start of the next round. this continues until it has invoked concepts 4 times in a mission.
It will refuse to share its magic while dirty or wet.

title: Dance of Arrows
text:
When dual wielding melee weapons you may spend 1 SD to attack with both.
You may use this effect multiple times per turn.

title: Dance of Blades
text:
On any turn you declare movement. Gain a 5+ evasion save against all attacks.
Does not stack with cover saves.

title: Dance of Blood
text:
You gain the following option on any attack:
-1 SD: Deal one extra damage to a living unarmoured target. This applies if you would ignore the armour due to accuracy or armour piercing.
+1 First Aid
